item.title: Creating and deploying Microsoft Azure App Service Plan
item.description: Short-hand: Azure DevOps - ADO Continuous Deployment - CD Continuous Integration - CI VS - Visual Studio In this blog I will give you an overview of Microsoft App Service plans, how to create and app Service Plan and finally how to create an App Service. We will talk about options on how to deploy code to App Services. To kick this off let me give you an overview of Microsoft App Service Plan.
